item.paragraph: Genetic testing laboratory sends detailed testing results to clinician office who makes diagnosis.

code.displayName: Office or other outpatient visit for the evaluation and management of an established patient, which requires a medically appropriate history and/or examination and low level of medical decision making. When using time for code selection, 20-29 minutes of total time is spent on the date of the encounter.

tr.td: Patient is concerned about being suffered from Rib-Cage Defect.
Patient is concerned about being suffered from Long-fingers.
Patient is concerned about being suffered from Flat feet.
Patient is concerned about being suffered from Double jointedness.
Clinician Orders genetic testing on multiple Fibrillin-1 (FBN1) gene variants (mutations)

code.displayName: genetic testing on multiple Fibrillin-1 (FBN1) gene variants (mutations)
Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

tr.td: genetic testing on multiple Fibrillin-1 (FBN1) gene variants (mutations)
shows that the “FBN1 c.7039_7040del (p.Met2347fs)” variant is positive, with all other tested FBN1 variants negative

observationRange.text: A negative value is a normal result
